subject: Guidelines for award of additional work to DPR/Supervision Consultants.
text: HRrTv 77qfty <HT gfaqrvt PHONE 91-11-25074100/25074200 (gc Wav7 #t Ta4rif #NT4) Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 Extn, 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 8 6. sector-10 DWARKA_ NEW DELHF-110045 No.11041/21/2002/Admn-IIF August 28, 2003 FOLICYMATTERS-ADMNSTRTIONFINANCE (53/2003) (Decision taken on Finance Division file no NHAI F&A Policy Matters/2003) Sub Guidelines for award of additional work to DPR Supervision Consultants Kindly refer to the Policy Circulars (44/2003) and (51/2003) of even number dated 1~ 2003 and July, 2003 regarding the award: of additional works, relating to any work that normally the DPR consultants would have done; to the existing DPR/Supervision Consultants as a variation to the main contract: 2 lt has been  decided that the individual cases for such variation may be approved by the Member concerned, subject to the conditions prescribed earlier vide the above Policy Circulars. This issues with the approval of Chairman: Sagcljou (S.
